main event: Witnesses observed 5 bright, glowing objects traveling at high speed over Columbus, Indiana on April 16, 1966.
interesting points: The objects were described as being the size of baseballs and having a steady reddish glow.
The objects moved quickly without making any sound or leaving a trail.
Observers compared the objects to five baseballs flying through the sky.
The sighting lasted for approximately 2 minutes and 30 seconds.
The objects were observed by a group of four friends in the Columbus, Indiana area.
photographs: no photographs included in the report
